basic_info.description: My name is Terese Mihalcin. I have studied Computer Science at Seton Hill University for four years. I will earn my BS in Computer Science in May 2022. I am passionate about all things technology but I have a particular interest in Front-end Development. I have experience in ReactJS and Angular. I also have experience in Mobile development, particularly using Swift for IOS and Java for Android. I am confident in my ability to use version control systems such as GitHub as well as SourceTree. My goal as a young professional is to increase my knowledge in all software development areas, Specifically ReactJS and JavaScript. I also aim to broaden my understanding of other development processes such as database management and Back-end development. I feel that the tools I received as Seton Hill University gave me the ability to follow the path I am aiming for, but I am eager to continue my learning experience in a professional setting. Outside of my studies I have played Collegiate volleyball at Seton Hill for four years. Additionally, I enjoy many outdoor activities such as skiing, biking, and kayaking.

projects.title: Sports Sceduling App
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
